post0.title: Title
post0.content: import numpy as np . X = np.random.normal(size = (400, 4)) Y = np.random.normal(size = 400) . ValueError Traceback (most recent call last) <ipython-input-5-52d034c4625b> in <module> 2 Y = np.random.normal(size = 400) 3 -> 4 X @ Y ValueError: matmul: Input operand 1 has a mismatch in its core dimension 0, with gufunc signature (n?,k),(k,m?)->(n?,m?) (size 400 is different from 4) . %timeit beta_ols = np.linalg.inv(X.T @ X) @ X.T @ Y . 153 µs ± 76.5 µs per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 7 runs, 1000 loops each) . %timeit np.linalg.inv(np.einsum('ji,jk->ik', X, X)) @ np.einsum('ji,j->i', X, Y) . 92.5 µs ± 292 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 7 runs, 10000 loops each) . np.einsum('an,ak->nk', X, X) . array([[377.90745388, 20.03593703, -5.38765227, -7.35685136], [ 20.03593703, 377.4622614 , 16.2115516 , 14.52466439], [ -5.38765227, 16.2115516 , 407.8323583 , -56.63311512], [ -7.35685136, 14.52466439, -56.63311512, 444.38849816]]) . X.T @ X . array([[377.90745388, 20.03593703, -5.38765227, -7.35685136], [ 20.03593703, 377.4622614 , 16.2115516 , 14.52466439], [ -5.38765227, 16.2115516 , 407.8323583 , -56.63311512], [ -7.35685136, 14.52466439, -56.63311512, 444.38849816]]) .

page1.title: About Me
page1.content: Hello, I am a statistician from a small German island. I graduated from the University of Bonn with a Master of Economics, where I specialized in statistics. In Bonn, I took courses on . econometrics | multivariate statistics | nonparametric statistics | the theory behind m-estimators | time series | the lasso family | functional data analysis | . In my free time, I learned about other techniques for example I read books about methods like gaussian process, UMAP, GLMM, deep learning and NLP. . Regarding the economics part, I did a mix of macroeconomics (DGSE) and micro theory (Game Theory, Auction Design, Mechanism Design) .
